title: Question 12: Why my computer could scan and gain SSID, but the connection fails while enabling the WLAN service of HG ?
answer:
(1) Check whether the client application supports the present manner of wireless authentication and encryption provided by HG.
(2) Check the configuration of MAC address filter and make sure that the wireless network card used is in the appropriate access range of MAC address.
(3) Look over that which users have access HG through wireless connection in the main page of HG and make sure that the total number of the users hasnâ€™t achieved the upper limit of 8.
